title: 2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor Iron Frame Mirrors Art Round Home Hanging Mirrors for Living Room/Bedroom/Bathroom/Entryway (Medium Size 15.7 inch)
descriptions:
Introducing the 2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor, the perfect addition to elevate your living space! 

Designed with a captivating "Circle on circles" pattern, these modern and artistic mirrors are the epitome of style and sophistication. Each set includes 2 mirrors, allowing you to create a stunning focal point in any room. 

With a medium size of 15.7 inches in diameter, these mirrors are ideal for hanging in your living room, bedroom, bathroom, or entryway. The iron frame adds a touch of elegance and durability, ensuring these mirrors will stand the test of time. 

Installation is a breeze with the easy-to-hang single screw method. Weighing only 2lbs, these mirrors are lightweight yet sturdy. The high-quality annealed glass provides HD imaging, preventing warping and distortion. 

The gold frame color adds a touch of glamour to any space, while the frame finish strikes the perfect balance between matte and bright. These mirrors seamlessly match with various decoration styles, allowing for endless possibilities. 

Let your creativity shine with the versatility of these mirrors. Whether you choose to style them independently or combine them with other wall art such as paintings, wall sculptures, or candle sconces, the result will be a visually stunning masterpiece. 

Rest assured, these mirrors will arrive in a decent package for safe delivery. So why wait? Transform your home today with the 2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor and experience the beauty of artistic design.
